thread.title: Price Reduced Wonderful Family Home Paradise on .47 Acre
thread.title_full: Price Reduced Wonderful Family Home Paradise on .47 Acre

title: Price Reduced Wonderful Family Home Paradise on .47 Acre
text:
Price Reduced Wonderful Family Home Paradise on .47 Acre ad date: 10/10/2015 
Paradise on .47 Acre 245 Bertsch Avenue, Crescent City, CA 3 bedrooms + large office which could be 4th bedroom. 2 living areas. Loft in detached shop/barn/garage was set up as classroom for home school. This 0.47 acre parcel is bordered by state park land and is set up with chicken coop, large patio and playland. Other features include cyclone fenced area and numerous species of trees. Just minutes to ocean beaches and Smith River Recreation Area. No. 1500201 $315,000
